title: When would I build Luden's Echo on who?
body:
^
Some of the AP Mids I play are Ahri, LB, Lissandra, Ori, Syndra

replies.body: Diana jungle? Keen to try it out.

> [{quoted}](name=hi im neko,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=scL9q7aE,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-03-14T07:28:49.092+0000)
>
> Diana jungle? Keen to try it out.

I tried it on diana mid. it's decent, but I reckon you'd be better off with lich bane.
Fizz half heatlh adc with q and w active

Probably Liss. Even more AOE from her spells which can be good
even ori i guess...
Well it helped pushing lanes as Kass. Have not tried it twice. Might work on Kennen.
